# Harmony Rutter

 

[City Council](https://www.sequimwa.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=5)  
Title: City Council Member  
Phone: (360) 582-2463  
[Email Harmony Rutter](mailto:hrutter@sequimwa.gov)

Having lived in Kitsap and Clallam County for all but 6 of her nearly 40 years on planet Earth, Harmony is committed to promoting a healthy and resilient community in the City of Sequim. After graduating with a Bachelor of Arts from Pacific Lutheran University, she has worked in both the private sector and with non-profit organizations that work to connect individuals, businesses, and communities with essential resources for their continued success. She currently works as the Program Administrator for a local volunteer organization and as the Music Director for a local religious organization. Her sweetheart and their two kids love living in the rainshadow of the Olympic Mountains.
